## ggplot: layers of graphics

1. 
    ```{r}
    ggplot(data = mpg)
    ```
2. 
    ```{r}
    ggplot(data = mpg) +
      geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
    ```
3.
    ```{r}
    ggplot(data = mpg) +
      geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
      geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
    ```

4.
    ```{r}
    ggplot(data = mpg) +
      geom_smooth(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
      geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
      
    ```
